NOTICE_DATA.n2016:PERFORMANCE_NUTS: ПОРАНЕШНА ЈУГОСЛОВЕНСКА РЕПУБЛИКА МАКЕДОНИЈА (PORANEŠNA JUGOSLOVENSKA REPUBLIKA MAKEDONIJA)

ML_TI_DOC.TI_CY: Dik li kienet ir-Repubblika Jugoslava tal-Maċedonja

ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Joint-stock company for construction and management of residential and commercial properties significant to the country — Skopje

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Joint-stock company for construction and management of residential and commercial properties significant to the country — Skopje

CONTRACTING_BODY.CA_TYPE_OTHER: Joint-stock company for construction and management of residential and commercial properties significant to the country — Skopje
CONTRACTING_BODY.CA_ACTIVITY_OTHER: Public enterprises, joint-stock companies and limited liability companies from included activities — housing, construction and transport

SHORT_DESCR.P: Procurement of goods — liquid fuels — petrol and diesel fuel for passenger motor vehicles in the Headquarters and Skopje, Bitola, Strumica, Kumanovo, Tetovo, Prilep, Kicevo, Kocani, Ohrid, Veles and Stip Subsidiaries. Procurement of liquid fuels — petrol, diesel fuel for passenger motor vehicles of the Joint Stock Company for Construction and Management of Housing and Business Premises of Importance for the Republic — Skopje, successively from the petrol stations of the bidder by using a non-cash payment card for period of 2 years.

Procurement of goods — liquid fuels — petrol and diesel fuel for passenger motor vehicles in the Headquarters and Skopje, Bitola, Strumica, Kumanovo, Tetovo, Prilep, Kicevo, Kocani, Ohrid, Veles and Stip Subsidiaries. Procurement of liquid fuels — petrol, diesel fuel for passenger motor vehicles of the Joint Stock Company for Construction and Management of Housing and Business Premises of Importance for the Republic — Skopje, successively from the petrol stations of the bidder by using a non-cash payment card for period of 2 years.

SUITABILITY.P: Capability of the economic operator for performing professional activity:
— document for registered activity.
Capability for performing professional activity:

In order to prove the capability for performing professional activity the economic operator should submit a document for registered activity — DRA template, as a proof that it has been registered as a natural person or legal entity for performing the activity related to the subject of the public procurement contract or a proof that it belongs to the appropriate professional association in accordance with the regulations of the country where the economic operator is registered.
In order to prove its personal status, the economic operator should submit the following documents:

— statement of the economic operator that no effective verdict has been issued against the economic operator within the past 5 years for participation in a crime organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
— confirmation stating that no bankruptcy procedure has been initiated by a competent body,
— confirmation stating that no liquidation procedure has been initiated by a competent body,
— certificate of paid taxes, benefits and other public duties issued by a competent body in the country where the economic operator is registered,

— confirmation from the Register of penalties for committed criminal offenses of legal entities proving that no secondary penalty — ban on participating in open call procedures, awarding public procurement contracts and contracts on public — private partnership has been pronounced,

— confirmation from the Register of penalties for committed criminal offenses of legal entities proving that no secondary penalty — temporary or permanent ban on performing particular activity has been pronounced,

— confirmation stating that no misdemeanour sanction — ban on the performance of the profession, activity or duty, i.e. temporary ban on the performance of a particular activity has been pronounced with an effective verdict.
Standards for quality systems:

In order to be qualified as capable for enforcement of the respective public procurement contract from the aspect of quality system standards, the economic operator should meet the following terms and conditions — The economic operator is obliged to ensure quality of the fuels, subject to procurement, in accordance with the applicable standards of RM, fulfilling the requirements harmonized with the European standards, as follows:
— for Eurosuper-95 / Eurosuper BS-95 MKC EN 228 2012+А1 2017 quality standard or equivalent thereof,
— for Eurodiesel BS (D-EV) — MKC EN 590 2013+А1 2017 quality standard or equivalent thereof.
Proof: Confirmations, certificates, lists or documents for fuel quality.

The quality of fuels offered by the bidders in the procedure should be in accordance with the valid Rulebook on quality of liquid fuels, published in the Official Gazette of RM nº 88/07, 91/07, 97/07, 105/07, 157/07, 15/08, 78/08, 156/08 and 81/09.
Proof: Statement that the fuels subject to procurement shall be in accordance with the valid Rulebook on quality of liquid.

Fuels published in the Official Gazette of RM nº 88/07, 91/07, 97/07, 105/07, 157/07, 15/08, 78/08, 156/08 and 81/09, signed electronically by enclosing valid digital certificate whose holder is the responsible person or a person authorized by the responsible person.
The quality system standards as a capability must not be supported by other entity.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: Necessary documents for proving the technical or professional capability of the economic operator:

— statement from the economic operator that it has at least 1 (one) petrol station at disposal in the cities Skopje, Bitola, Strumica, Kumanovo, Tetovo, Prilep, Kicevo, Kocani, Ohrid, Veles and Stip, with enclosed List of petrol stations in the specified cities. The statement must be electronically signed, by enclosing a valid digital certificate, whose holder is the responsible person or the person authorized by the responsible person,

— statement from the economic operator that it has system for non-cash payment card at its disposal, electronically signed, by enclosing a valid digital certificate, whose holder is the responsible person or the person authorized by the responsible person.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_MIN_LEVEL.P: Minimum criteria for determining the technical and professional status of the economic operator:
— the economic operator has a network of petrol stations with minimum 1 (one) petrol station in the cities — Skopje, Bitola, Strumica, Kumanovo, Tetovo, Prilep, Kicevo, Kocani, Ohrid, Veles and Stip,
— the economic operator has system for non-cash card payment.

INFO_ADD_EAUCTION.P: The total price is subject of the e-auction.
The minimum allowed differences in the process of negative bidding are 1% of the value of the initial price.
The maximum allowed differences in the process of negative bidding are 10% of the value of the initial price.
The e-auction will be conducted in 1 round with duration of 30 (thirty) minutes.

PLACE.P: Joint-stock company for construction and management of residential and commercial properties significant to the country — Skopje, Address: Str. Orce Nikolov nº 138, Skopje, City and postal code: Skopje 1000 and via www.e-nabavki.gov.mk

INFO_ADD.P: At the public opening of tenders, may attend any person who is interested.Only authorized representatives of bidders may participate in the procedure of public opening of bids by giving their comments in the minutes of opening of bids. Authorized representatives of the bidders at the public opening must have an authorization signed by the person in charge.
Statement for independent tender bid: Yes.
